name: prysm-validator.public.dappnode.eth
description: A validator client which manages a staking user's private/public keys, connects to a beacon node, and acts as a validator in Ethereum 2.0 by staking 32 ETH and participating in proof of stake consensus by proposing and voting on blocks. [more info](https://medium.com/prysmatic-labs/introducing-topaz-testnet-8e8a4e00a700)
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)
